name: Basketball Shots - Arcade Edition
description:
Play like Stephen Curry, the best 3 point shooter ever and Golden State Warriors legend. Try to make impossible shots from behind the backboard until you reach the highest backboard score. As the levels go up, the basket board moves faster and faster, making shooting and scoring more and more difficult.

Renowned for his shooting accuracy, pro basketball player Stephen Curry of the Golden State Warriors was the first person to be named Most Valuable Player by unanimous vote in NBA history.
He was born in Akron, Ohio like other NBA legend and Cleveland Cavs hero Lebron James and we can certainly say that they are both great, great champions of Basketball who have already earned their star status alongside Michael Jordan.

Despite his slight frame and boyish looks, Curry proved more than capable of handling the NBA opposition with his shooting and ball-handling abilities. The 6'3" guard averaged more than 22 points per game after the 2010 All-Star break, and wound up finishing second in the Rookie of the Year balloting. His impressive play earned him a spot on the USA Men's Basketball Senior National Team, which won the gold medal at the 2010 World Championships. As one half of the "Splash Brothers" duo, which also featured sharpshooting guard Klay Thompson, Curry led an exciting Warriors team to an early 16-game win streak and was the leading vote-getter for the 2015 All-Star Game.

Curry Shooting is a basketball game created in honor of and to celebrate Stephen Curry and what he's been able to accomplish in his amazing career in the NCAA and in the NBA, and his exceptional shooting skills with a basketball. His 3 point basketball shots are without a doubt he best the NBA has ever seen in the sport of basketball and now you can do the same by playing like Stephen Curry. The object of the game is simple. Tap to shoot just like Stephen Curry and try to score as you move up increasingly difficult levels. Steph Curry practices his shots all day long and now, you can do the same in Curry Shooting.

- 10+ Levels (and more)
- Basketball shots
- Free to Play
- Lots of fun
- Addicting
